pullrequest.title: Game logic plugin keeps track of allowed run duration

content.raw:
Would it make sense to call `::Finish` once the time expires, or will we address sim shutdown in another way?

Currently, Cloudsim subscribes to `/subt/start` and it's the only way it knows when to shutdown a simulation.

‌
content.html:
